title: Mother and Son Series 1 (1984) DVDRip

Mother and Son Series 1 (1984)

Storyline: Arthur Beare is a 40 something son still living at home taking care of his senile mother Maggie. However no matter what he does he cannot seem to get ahead and is always coming unstuck, where Robert cannot put a foot wrong in his mothers eyes, where all he is after is his mothers hidden money.
